survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the adoption and effectiveness of sustainable practices in office environments, focusing on employee engagement and perceived benefits.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your office currently implement? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure options are clear and cover common sustainable practices.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your office currently implement? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How effective do you believe your office's sustainability initiatives are?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button scale. Include a 'Not sure' option for neutrality.

script.question_text: How effective do you believe your office's sustainability initiatives are?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, does your office face in adopting more sustainable practices?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, does your office face in adopting more sustainable practices?

questions.question_text: Would you be more likely to participate in sustainability initiatives if incentives were offered?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge motivation. Include a 'Not applicable' option.

script.question_text: Would you be more likely to participate in sustainability initiatives if incentives were offered?

questions.question_text: Which department do you work in?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question for demographic segmentation. Include an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which department do you work in?
